name: Lavond A. HILL, Appellant v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of Corrections, Eric P. Bush, Superintendent of SCI-Pine Grove, Appellees

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2016, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM
